channel.title: Npc loading
channel.description:
Well, I was messing around with my server, trying to get npc's to load. Right?
Well, atfirst, i got an error, and I was like, so I deleted the npc's and just went ahead and kept playing the server as is. Then I redid my npc files, and got this error.
Someone please help, i'm really needing to add godwars.
Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1500 at net.com.codeusa.npcs.update.NPCMovement.playerPos(NPCMovement.java:11 2) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.update.NPCMovement.getNextNPCMovement(NPCMovemen t.java:58) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.update.NPCMovement.randomWalk(NPCMovement.java:1 48) at net.com.codeusa.Engine.run(Engine.java:258) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
Here is the code i have, spawn = 3029 2594 3404 -1 0 0 0 0 0 sc shop notice, 9 numbers.
Here is the code i'm trying to add, spawn = 12 3085 3416 4 3087 3418 3083 3414 BARBARIAN notice, 8 numbers.
Someone please help - don't say nooby answers like use google or the search button, Already tried. If you can't help gtfo the thread.

item.title: Npc loading
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

Hmm… If it doesen’t work, i’ll tell you.

RE; Nope no workie… They are already tabbed.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc loading
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Just replace spaces with one tab. It should line up with your other lines, however you shouldn’t be using any spaces while doing this.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc loading
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

In between the numbers are spaces. You need to use a tab.

Here is a fixed one as an example:

spawn	=	12	3085	3416	4	3087	3418	3083	3414	BARBARIAN

Read full topic

item.title: Npc loading
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

Chassy, they are tabs, can you please explain further?

Read full topic

item.title: Npc loading
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Use tabs in .cfg files, not spaces.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc loading
item.dc:creator: @PartyKing PartyKing
item.description:
@PartyKing wrote:

hmm, im really not sure, mine using the code i posted, so i dont know what your problem is.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc loading
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

I thought it was going to work, you know there being 9 numbers, but this is the error.

Btw using CodeUsa.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "6 257 2867 5325 2 0 0 0 0 0 Sara" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException. java:48) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:458) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:499) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.loading.LoadNPCLists.loadNPCs(LoadNPCLists.java: 45) at net.com.codeusa.npcs.loading.LoadNPCLists.(LoadNPCLists.java:21 ) at net.com.codeusa.Engine.(Engine.java:170) at net.com.codeusa.Server.main(Server.java:77)

Read full topic

item.title: Npc loading
item.dc:creator: @PartyKing PartyKing
item.description:
@PartyKing wrote:

try this

[code]spawn = ID AX AY HI NEX NEY SWX SWY NN[code/]

[/code]
